measured_by: confidence ratings correlated with response accuracy
justification: “Typically, metacognition is inferred from confidence ratings and their relationship to the response accuracy (Fleming & Lau, 2014).”
“An alternative and extremely popular method used to measure metacognitive sensitivity is the Cognitive Reflection Test (Frederick, 2005).”
“We asked people to rate how likely they (and regular people) are to fall into some of the decision traps.”
